::Hot Rod::

"Beast mode." Hot Rod transformes to his "bat" mode, and flyes away,
barly escaping the energon blast.
"Hot Rod, MAXIMIZE!" Hot Rod turns back to bot mode, and launches two
rockets at Defection.
